backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining product, service, client, appointment, and portfolio-photo types with CRUD operations and ID counters for a salon management backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level product features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with Portuguese metadata and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component handling navigation across the four main pages and rendering layout and toast system.
frontend/src/components/agenda/Appointme: Modal form for creating new appointments with client/service selection, time, and notes.
UI card for displaying appointment details including time, client, service, status, and notes.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandHeade: Header showing salon monogram and wordmark images with a premium branding label.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientD: Displays detailed client info with tabs for preferences, allergies, and appointment history pulled from agenda and services hooks.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientF: Dialog form for creating a new client with validation and submission via useClientesMutations.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductF: Dialog form to add a product to inventory, including validation for numeric fields and submitting via useEstoqueMutations.
frontend/src/components/estoque/StockAdj: Dialog for increasing or decreasing a product's stock quantity with validation and update via useEstoqueMutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with sidebar navigation, header, footer, and container for rendering page content.
frontend/src/components/servicos/Service: Dialog form to create a new service with validated duration and price fields using useServicosMutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgenda.ts: Fetches and filters appointments by date and provides mutations for creating new appointments.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientes.ts: Loads all clients and provides a mutation for adding new clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useEstoque.ts: Fetches products and provides mutations to add products or update quantities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and exposes identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a minimal backend health check query using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useServicos.ts: Loads all services, filters active ones, and provides mutations to add services or toggle status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a premium gold-themed light/dark design system with custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AgendaDeHojePage.tsx: Renders the daily agenda view with date navigation and appointment listing/creation UI.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogoDeServicosPag: UI page for listing, searching, creating, and toggling active status of services with price and duration formatting.
frontend/src/pages/ControleDeEstoquePage: Inventory management page enabling product search, lowâ€‘stock filtering, creation, and stock adjustment dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/FidelidadeClientesPag: Client loyalty page with search, client list, creation dialog, and detail panel selection handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, requirements, design notes, and existing implemented functionality.
